_sText: This map isn't complete 100%, I just wanted to release it to get recommendations, and to see what you all thought of it. The idea first started from wanting to recreate the Pool map from the game S.T.A.L.K.E.R. for CS:S. Then I just kept adding stuff and have what I am offering you now. No real story yet, doesn't really need one anyways. It's just simply an AIM map right now. But, once I'm done with this map, I plan on making a de_ (maybe cs_) version of it as well. Actual Known Problems 1. Men's bathroom near CT Spawn has a section of a wall that I accidently NoDrawed. 2. Ladders/Carved holes are a bitch to get in and out of. Auto To/Do's Lighting is quite...dull...But take this one and hold it up against my first map (seb_deathbox). It looks quite lovely, and much more lively. But still, I'm going to try to tweak the settings to make it look much better. I want to fix those ladders/holes. You can get through them, but sometimes they like to snag you. Some areas of the map don't really make me feel like it's "complete". So I plan on adding more models. Help...Please Aside from telling me that it sucks, I would really like some help for future reference. As I'm a beginner to this and would like to learn as much as possible about this program. I would like to know how to add Place names. I followed the tut found on this site, but it didn't tell me how to add any. Is there any custom models/textures/decal sites out there? Well, thanks for trying my map. Questions? Comments? Email me at sebhael AT hotmail DOT com or just use FPSB's PM system.
